segments.text: I notice the details in this kitchen drawing right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is positioned by the sink, attending to her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of clean bowls sit on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the water overflowing from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't reacted; her expression is totally blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar shows pure determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilt makes me hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, palm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, revealing a peaceful outdoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a path look inviting out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside and outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this mischief will go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
